verses.verse: "Do you think <S%H2803><s%> this <S%H384><s%> is according to justice <S%H4941><s%>? Do you say, <S%H559><s%> 'My righteousness <S%H6664><s%> is more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> God's'?

"For you say, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> advantage <S%H5532><s%> will it be to You? What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> shall I have, more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> if I had sinned <S%H9128><s%>?'
"I will answer <S%H7725><s%> <S%H4405><s%> you, And your friends <S%H7453><s%> with you.
"Look <S%H5027><s%> at the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and see; <S%H7200><s%> And behold <S%H7789><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> â€“ they are higher <S%H1361><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you.

"If <S%H518><s%> you have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> do you accomplish <S%H6466><s%> against Him? And if your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are many, <S%H7231><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> do you do <S%H6213><s%> to Him?
"If <S%H518><s%> you are righteous, <S%H6663><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> do you give <S%H5414><s%> to Him? Or <S%H176><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> does He receive <S%H3947><s%> from your hand <S%H3027><s%>?
"Your wickedness <S%H7562><s%> is for a man <S%H376><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> yourself, And your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is for a son <S%H1121><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>

"Because <S%H4480><s%> of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of oppressions <S%H6217><s%> they cry <S%H2199><s%> out; They cry <S%H7768><s%> for help <S%H7768><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the mighty. <S%H7227><s%>
"But no <S%H3808><s%> one says, <S%H559><s%> 'Where <S%H346><s%> is God <S%H433><s%> my Maker, <S%H6213><s%> Who gives <S%H5414><s%> songs <S%H2158><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%>

Who teaches <S%H502><s%> us more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> And makes <S%H2449><s%> us wiser <S%H2449><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>?'
"There <S%H8033><s%> they cry <S%H6817><s%> out, but He does not answer <S%H6030><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men. <S%H7451><s%>
"Surely <S%H389><s%> God <S%H410><s%> will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to an empty <S%H7723><s%> [cry,] Nor <S%H3808><s%> will the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> regard <S%H7789><s%> it.

"How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> less <S%H637><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you say <S%H559><s%> you do not behold <S%H7789><s%> Him, The case <S%H1779><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> Him, and you must wait <S%H9123><s%> for Him!

"And now, <S%H6258><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> He has not visited <S%H6485><s%> [in] His anger, <S%H639><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> has He acknowledged <S%H3045><s%> transgression <S%H6588><s%> well, <S%H3966><s%>
So Job <S%H347><s%> opens <S%H6475><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> emptily; <S%H1892><s%> He multiplies <S%H3527><s%> words <S%H4405><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>"
